meta-review.comment:
Hippo Penny! Get ready for a groovy review of LEGO Marvel Super Heroes 2!

As I dove into this intergalactic adventure, I couldn't help but think of all the other critics out there, like IGN, who gave this game an 80. They said it's "constantly fun to play" and that the wide variety of settings, heroes, and abilities keep things fresh. And yeah, they're right – even when you're fighting the same old villains for the umpteenth time, the sheer excitement of exploring new worlds keeps the energy up.

GameSpot chimed in with a 70, noting that while the game's "cheerful gameplay" is fun, it's also "starting to sag somewhat." Ouch! But hey, at least they're being honest about those extra pursuits you might wanna try – I mean, who doesn't love saving the world with Spider-Man or fighting alongside the Guardians of the Galaxy? (Gaming Age agrees, by the way. They gave this game an 83 and said it's "better than the last Marvel LEGO release.")

Cheat Code Central thought it was a 82, mainly because of that massive roster of over two hundred characters – talk about a party! And Vandal concurred with a 77, saying it's all about the universe and formula being good enough to make for an enjoyable game. SpazioGames echoed this sentiment with their 80 review, praising the variety of characters, locations, and situations that keep things fresh.

But wait – what about Destructoid? They gave it a mere 70, complaining that the core mechanics are "rooted firmly in the past." I get where they're coming from; after all these years, you'd think the LEGO formula would be getting stale. But honestly, there's something to be said for those familiar, comforting mechanics – they may not be revolutionary, but they work!

So, what's my take on this game? Well, let me put it this way: I'm having a blast (pun intended) playing through this LEGO Marvel Super Heroes 2 adventure. It's all about the fun – and even when it gets a bit samey-same, there's always something new around the corner to keep things interesting. So if you're looking for a lighthearted, action-packed romp through the Marvel universe, look no further!

Stay groovy, gamers!
